headline: HP Inc. (HPQ) Downgraded to “In Line” as Analysts See Limited Upside
summary: HP Inc. (NYSE:HPQ) is one of the AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. On September 10, Evercore ISI analyst Amit Daryanani downgraded the stock from Outperform to “In Line” with a price target of $29.00 stating that they don’t see further upside ahead. The firm noted that for earnings or cash flow to grow meaningfully, stronger trends […]
